Uses of Interface
ec.co.ant.ComponentSelector

Packages that use ComponentSelector
Package
Description
ec.co.ant
Ant Colony Optimization algorithms This package contains the components necessary to implement ACO algorithms, specifically the classic pair: Ant System and Ant Colony System.

  • Uses of ComponentSelector in ec.co.ant

    Classes in ec.co.ant that implement ComponentSelector
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    GreedyComponentSelector
    A trivial rule that builds solutions greedily to have the highest heuristic value in the neighborhood.
    class 
    ProportionateComponentSelector
    Provides a function that chooses a Component stochastically in the style of Ant System.
    class 
    PseudorandomProportionateComponentSelector
    The classic ant transition rule used by Ant Colony System.
